title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing spring in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the week in a dream through the interpretation of the books of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, or Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the celebration of the week dreaming of giving birth alone, married, pregnant or divorced, through our article on the “Mahzat” website, since the Arab countries have customs for establishing A family party on the seventh day after the birth of the infant. It is a party with its own rituals that may differ from one country to another, but it is consistent in general and historically. The distribution of sweets and the gathering of children around the infant. Some of them celebrate the Pharaonic rituals again, and he has a series that we dreamed of a week ago in his dream. He does not know the interpretation of that. Interpretation of a dream about distributing the week in a dream: A married or single woman may see herself as offering sweets for the week in a dream, and as we mentioned above, the week is one of the happy occasions that the ancient Egyptians celebrated and passed down through generations. Scientists have interpreted it as the coming of Joy and closeness. In addition, distributing sweets in a dream is evidence of spreading joy and happiness in the dreamer’s home. Interpretation of a dream of the week for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees herself within a week or distributes sweets for seven days in her home, this is evidence of the emergence of happy news or a new life. Some scholars have interpreted this as a girl’s piety and good morals. The dream of the seventh day of an unmarried girl in a dream symbolizes the presence of happy news that will bring joy to the dreamer’s heart soon, by the command of God Almighty. As for the interpretation of a dream about distributing a week to a single woman in a dream, this indicates that her life It will change for the better, because it is a symbol of the approaching date of her engagement or marriage to a rich man. Interpretation of the dream of the week in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees herself in a dream celebrating the week of a new baby, this is a sign of joy and happiness in her home. Aside from being a symbol and sign of an upcoming new period. The week symbolizes for a married woman in a dream to hear good news that will make her heart happy soon, God willing. As for the interpretation of a dream in which a married woman gives a weekly bag in a dream and she is happy, this indicates the expansion of her scope of living and there is a good coming for her that will make her life better. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream for a divorced woman can For a divorced woman to see in her dream celebrating the newborn week, which indicates the end of her problems and the desire for a new life. While she sees her distributing sweets to those present, this indicates that joy and happiness are coming, because some scholars interpreted that distributing sweets to people in a dream indicates love and closeness. Of people with good relationships who make her life better. Interpretation of a dream about a week for a pregnant woman: The importance of seeing a week in a dream for a pregnant woman is the ease of her birth and her health, in addition to her expected child. When you dream of distributing the week of the baby to a pregnant woman, this indicates that the visionary receives love from those around her. Seeing a woman in a man’s dream. A man may see a weekday holiday in his dreams and witness a new baby in his house. This is a sign of a serious life.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing carpets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a carpet in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about carpets in a dream in detail A real scientific explanation by major scholars in the interpretation of dreams. Carpets are a type of carpet on which homes and places are spread so that they cover the ground as well as the walls are attached to it. There are many shapes and types of carpets, and with the development of the centuries the carpet industry has developed and is most famous. The types of carpets are Iranian and Turkish carpets, and many people see carpets in their dreams and would like to explain this dream that we get through the interpretation of the dream of seeing carpets according to leading interpreters and researchers, as carpets are also interpreted as married, pregnant, and men. Interpretation of a dream about carpets by Ibn Sirin: The Seeing a carpet in a dream is a symbol of a woman’s purity or her acquisition of a religious status. Seeing the dreamer walking on carpets means wealth and prosperity. Seeing the dreamer buying carpets means that he will make a profit. Interpretation of a dream for a girl who sees carpets is a sign of her owning a beautiful and elegant home. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi carpets: Saw Al-Nabulsi sees in a dream the folded carpet, which indicates his distance from the pleasures of the world. Seeing the dreamer has a carpet but it is made of silk, and this indicates the worship that he performs. Also, seeing a carpet in a dream is evidence of this person’s eminence and elevation among people. Seeing yourself walking On a large and wide carpet at the same time indicates the long life of the clothes. Seeing a dreamer spreading the carpet in an unknown place means that he is spending a lot of money on travel. Interpretation of a dream about carpets for single women: Seeing a carpet in a dream for a person means that he has achieved what he wants in his life. As for seeing it As she prays on the carpet, this indicates that she will achieve her goals and desires. As for seeing the clean carpet, it means by her gospel that she will live a life full of hope and optimism. An unmarried person in a dream buys a carpet because it indicates that he will get married soon, and the extreme beauty of the carpet indicates that the husband is good in morals. And the shape. Seeing a finished carpet in a dream is an indication that it will be particularly good and blessed if the carpet is green. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman: For a married woman who sees a carpet in a dream, it is evidence of obedience and security. A married woman who dreams of buying a green carpet indicates That she will give birth to a child and receive good care. For a married woman to see in a dream, as if her husband gave her a carpet as a gift, is evidence that she has achieved something she really wanted. Just as a carpet in a dream symbolizes money and livelihood, owning a rich carpet is a sign of good things that You will come to me. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman on the carpet indicates that the woman in labor will give birth easily without feeling the pain of childbirth. A clean and good-looking carpet is a sign of the goodness that she will receive when giving birth. Seeing a pregnant woman buying a carpet in a dream means that Her due date is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a man: Seeing that he is buying a green carpet is an indication of his marriage to a good, loving woman. For married people who see that he is buying a carpet, etc.

title: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream. Meaning of twins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about twins for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether they are twins, a boy and a girl, or twins from Ibn Sirin and more than twins. Interpretation of twins in a dream The birth of twins is one of the things that men and women love very much, because they give birth to two children together, either They are of the same sex and features, i.e. identical twins, or of the same sex rather than half. The shape and features, or their difference in gender, such that one is a boy and the other is a girl, and the birth of twins results from the fertilization of the egg by two sperm, which leads to its division into two identical parts. They give birth to identical twins, who are in the same uterine sac. As for non-identical twins in appearance and characteristics, they consist of two eggs, each of which is different from the other and was fertilized separately. A different way. In a dream, a married or pregnant girl or woman may see that she is giving birth to twins or two girls, or giving birth to twins, one of whom is a girl and the other is a boy, and there are those who dream about it. To give birth to more than one twin, with a number that may be 3, 4 or more children. A man may dream that his wife is the one who gave birth or that she was the one who gave birth while he was sleeping and that he was in love. To present this interpretation with a simplified explanation supported by many commentators.Interpretation of the birth of twins in a dream Most interpreters say that when twins are born in a dream, it depends on the dreamer’s condition. If the woman is pregnant, the twins may be a severe pain that will affect her later in the pregnancy or difficulty in giving birth. This pain is said after birth because she saw that she had finished giving birth. In the case of a married woman who is not pregnant, her interpretation is sadness and pain over something that is difficult for her, and it may be related to her life. With her husband or one of her children, or hardships and hardships and. Poverty, and for a virgin girl, if she sees that she has given birth to twins, this indicates two things, either a sin she committed with a strange man that she must leave her path so that it does not end. Or she will lose some of her dignity and happiness for something in life without getting anything from what she works for. Interpretation of giving birth to twin girls in a dream: female twins or girls is good, optimism, and livelihood, according to the interpreters. A pregnant woman’s vision that she has given birth to twin girls can indicate her safety and the safety of what is in her stomach. After giving birth, it can also indicate the goodness that she will feel in her pregnancy and that she will be happy with it, for something that she prayed to God or wanted, and some commentators said that it is abundance in life and money. As for the young unmarried girl who sees that she has given birth to twins, she will be happy Many times in the coming days, there will be a sudden matter that you did not know and did not expect. As for men, if someone sees that his wife gave birth to twins, then he will gain in trade or a livelihood in his work, money, and excellence in his affairs, and if he sees that he is the one who gives birth to twins, then the people around him will love him, because Daughters are more merciful and attached to the father, so he has prestige and goodness in the souls of those around him. Interpretation of giving birth to more than one twin in a dream: Whoever dreams of a man and his wife in a dream, or a woman and a girl dreaming

title: Interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dreamEggs in a dream is a symbol of what covers the truth. It is an attempt to discover the truths that we will reveal to you. Interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dreamEggs have a positive meaning in a dream, and breaking them is also a search for the truth. The general meaning of the interpretation of eggs in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream is A concern for some people. Therefore, a different website will show you the following about seeing eggs in a dream: Sheikh Nabulsi said about eggs in a dream that the yolk of the egg means gold, and the white of the egg means the silver of gold. This was referred to in the dream of children and marriage. Eggs also show halal and haram money. It also indicates graves and cemeteries. This means all of this according to the details of the vision and the condition of the dreamer. It also has connotations of collecting money, and eggs can indicate the gathering of relatives. As the dream interpreter says, in the general sense of what eggs are seen in a dream, it is interpreted with children or money. It is also interpreted as seeds, ideas, and projects that have been started. It explains the gathering of the family for its purpose. Interpretation of the types of eggs and their conditions. Large eggs in a dream, meaning the fetus before its birth. Small eggs in a dream indicate a fetus in the first months of pregnancy. Seeing colored eggs in a dream indicates that God is Most High. It is known better about children of different nationalities. As for the meaning of the interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dream, chicken eggs, it is a simple diet. If a person dreams that he is laying an egg under a chicken, this may be a pregnancy for his wife. And whoever sees that a rooster is laying eggs in a dream He gathers people and children under his wing. Anyone who sees pigeon eggs in a dream indicates the beginning of a new project and will be successful. Whoever sees ostrich eggs, cowardly children appear. Whoever sees snake eggs in a dream, this indicates the beginning of a new life. Seeing scorpion eggs in a dream also indicates cunning children. Insect eggs in a dream indicate an intruder. Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing many eggs in a dream indicates a lot of nutrition, and here is the interpretation of some other visions of eggs: Interpretation of eating raw eggs in a dream indicates that money is forbidden. Interpretation of eating raw eggs in a dream About worries, slander and immorality. Eggs also indicate graves in a dream. Seeing yourself eating eggshells in a dream means graves and stealing the dead from the graves. Also, boiled eggs in a dream symbolize fixing a difficult situation and reaching a solution to problems. Eating boiled eggs in a dream with their shells on A sign of digging graves. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is eating peeled eggs, he may marry a rich person. If he sees while eating eggs in a dream that he is burping or vomiting, then he is eating the woman’s money. Seeing eggs in a woman’s dream We will tell you the interpretation of seeing many eggs in a dream in points. Next: Seeing eggs in a woman’s dream generally refers to her children or a person who takes care of other children. Seeing eating eggs in a dream may indicate the benefit of children. preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream: Seeing kings in reality arouses terror and joy in anyone, because no one can meet them and approach them in reality, but what is the meaning of seeing them in a dream, especially if this dream is a specific king? This is what we will learn along the way. Interpretation of seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream. This vision clearly shows the meanings that this dreamer will have an important status in the future, and his status will also clearly rise among everyone who knows him. And if he This dreamer lives in another country for another ruler, so this indicates that he will travel to the king’s country and enjoy a huge and great living so that his life will be better than before. Seeing any king in a dreamer’s dream means getting rid of the accumulated fears that make him constantly sad, in addition to expressing a solution to any Problem no matter what. His life. The vision is good news for the dreamer that he will pay off all his debts and become very rich. If this king gives money in a dream to this dreamer and he is in a happy state, then this is a sign that happy things will happen that will bring goodness to him later. But if the king gives If the dreamer sees that the king has come to his house to see and talk to him, this clearly indicates the abundance of goodness in that house. If the dreamer mistreats the king In a dream and insulted him, this is evidence that this king will be insulted by many of his people and that the people will remove all their oppression before this king. Seeing the king in a dream by Ibn SirinWe find that Imam Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the king or the ruler in general in a dream is evidence that this The dreamer cares about his religion properly and works hard in obedience to God Almighty to earn his obedience in all aspects of his life. It is also a sure expression that this dreamer will reach an important power in the state that will change his life for the happier. Seeing Arab kings bodes well for the dreamer, unlike foreign kings, where it is a sign However, some people wronged him. And if he sees himself as the king of a non-Arab country, this explains his travel and separation from his family to work or study. His visit to the dreamer’s house is considered important evidence of his life, which has greatly improved to the maximum extent. But if the king came to the dreamer’s house, but he was not in good condition. Good and unorganized, this indicates that he entered into a financial struggle that made him feel poor during that period. The king sitting with the dreamer in his house is evidence of his progress in the field in which he works. Eating with him in a dream is important evidence that this fortuneteller has many among the people and that he He continues to be promoted due to his extreme intelligence. The king’s clothing and color in the dream also carry important meanings, as we find that the color red is evidence of his unfitness to be king, as he is very separated from his people. The damage to his country. Interpretation of the dream of seeing King Salman in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees him dead in his dream, this is good and indicates that this dreamer will enjoy a large diet and an infusion of money.

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the week in a dream through the interpretation of the books of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, or Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the celebration of the week dreaming of giving birth alone, married, pregnant or divorced, through our article on the “Mahzat” website, since the Arab countries have customs for establishing A family party on the seventh day after the birth of the infant. It is a party with its own rituals that may differ from one country to another, but it is consistent in general and historically. The distribution of sweets and the gathering of children around the infant. Some of them celebrate the Pharaonic rituals again, and he has a series that we dreamed of a week ago in his dream. He does not know the interpretation of that. Interpretation of a dream about distributing the week in a dream: A married or single woman may see herself as offering sweets for the week in a dream, and as we mentioned above, the week is one of the happy occasions that the ancient Egyptians celebrated and passed down through generations. Scientists have interpreted it as the coming of Joy and closeness. In addition, distributing sweets in a dream is evidence of spreading joy and pleasure in the dreamer’s home. Interpretation of a dream of the week for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees herself within a week or distributes sweets for seven days in her home, this is evidence of the emergence of happy news or a new life. Some scholars have interpreted this as a girl’s piety and good morals. The dream of the seventh day of an unmarried girl in a dream symbolizes the presence of happy news that will bring joy to the dreamer’s heart soon, by the command of God Almighty. As for the interpretation of a dream about distributing a week to a single woman in a dream, this indicates that her life It will change for the better, because it is a symbol of the approaching date of her engagement or marriage to a rich man. Interpretation of the dream of the week in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees herself in a dream celebrating the week of a new baby, this is a sign of joy and happiness in her home. Aside from being a symbol and sign of an upcoming new period. The week symbolizes for a married woman in a dream to hear good news that will make her heart happy soon, God willing. As for the interpretation of a dream in which a married woman gives a weekly bag in a dream and she is happy, this indicates the expansion of her scope of living and there is a good coming for her that will make her life better. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream for a divorced woman can For a divorced woman to see in her dream celebrating the newborn week, which indicates the end of her problems and the desire for a new life. While she sees her distributing sweets to those present, this indicates that joy and happiness are coming, because some scholars interpreted that distributing sweets to people in a dream indicates love and closeness. Of people with good relationships who make her life better. Interpretation of a dream about a week for a pregnant woman: The importance of seeing a week in a dream for a pregnant woman is the ease of her birth and her health, in addition to her expected child. When you dream of distributing the week of the baby to a pregnant woman, this indicates that the visionary receives love from those around her. Seeing a woman in a man’s dream. A man may see a weekday holiday in his dreams and witness a new baby in his house. This is a sign of a serious life.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing carpets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a carpet in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about carpets in a dream in detail A real scientific explanation by major scholars in the interpretation of dreams. Carpets are a type of carpet on which homes and places are spread so that they cover the ground as well as the walls are attached to it. There are many shapes and types of carpets, and with the development of the centuries the carpet industry has developed and is most famous. The types of carpets are Iranian and Turkish carpets, and many people see carpets in their dreams and would like to explain this dream that we get through the interpretation of the dream of seeing carpets according to leading interpreters and researchers, as carpets are also interpreted as married, pregnant, and men. Interpretation of a dream about carpets by Ibn Sirin: The Seeing a carpet in a dream is a symbol of a woman’s purity or her acquisition of a religious status. Seeing the dreamer walking on carpets means wealth and prosperity. Seeing the dreamer buying carpets means that he will make a profit. Interpretation of a dream for a girl who sees carpets is a sign of her owning a beautiful and elegant home. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi carpets: Saw Al-Nabulsi sees in a dream the folded carpet, which indicates his distance from the pleasures of the world. Seeing the dreamer has a carpet but it is made of silk, and this indicates the worship that he performs. Also, seeing a carpet in a dream is evidence of this person’s eminence and elevation among people. Seeing yourself walking On a large and wide carpet at the same time indicates the long life of the clothes. Seeing a dreamer spreading the carpet in an unknown place means that he is spending a lot of money on travel. Interpretation of a dream about carpets for single women: Seeing a carpet in a dream for a person means that he has achieved what he wants in his life. As for seeing it As she prays on the carpet, this indicates that she will achieve her goals and desires. As for seeing the clean carpet, it means by her gospel that she will live a life full of hope and optimism. An unmarried person in a dream buys a carpet because it indicates that he will get married soon, and the extreme beauty of the carpet indicates that the husband is good in morals. And the shape. Seeing a finished carpet in a dream is an indication that it will be particularly good and blessed if the carpet is green. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman: For a married woman who sees a carpet in a dream, it is evidence of obedience and security. A married woman who dreams of buying a green carpet indicates That she will give birth to a child and receive good care. For a married woman to see in a dream, as if her husband gave her a carpet as a gift, is evidence that she has achieved something she really wanted. Just as a carpet in a dream symbolizes money and livelihood, owning a rich carpet is a sign of good things that You will come to me. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman on the carpet indicates that the woman in labor will give birth easily without feeling the pain of childbirth. A clean and good-looking carpet is a sign of the goodness that she will receive when giving birth. Seeing a pregnant woman buying a carpet in a dream means that Her due date is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a man: Seeing that he is buying a green carpet is an indication of his marriage to a good, loving woman. For married people who see that he is buying a carpet, etc.

title: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream. Meaning of twins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about twins for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether they are twins, a boy and a girl, or twins from Ibn Sirin and more than twins. Interpretation of twins in a dream The birth of twins is one of the things that men and women love very much, because they give birth to two children together, either They are of the same sex and characteristics, i.e. identical twins, or of the same sex rather than half. The shape and features, or their difference in gender, such that one is a boy and the other is a girl, and the birth of twins results from the fertilization of the egg by two sperm, which leads to its division into two identical parts. They give birth to identical twins, who are in the same uterine sac. As for non-identical twins in appearance and characteristics, they consist of two eggs, each of which is different from the other and was fertilized separately. A different way. In a dream, a married or pregnant girl or woman may see that she is giving birth to twins or two girls, or giving birth to twins, one of whom is a girl and the other is a boy, and there are those who dream about it. To give birth to more than one twin, with a number that may be 3, 4 or more children. A man may dream that his wife is the one who gave birth or that she was the one who gave birth while he was sleeping and that he was in love. To present this interpretation with a simplified explanation supported by many commentators.Interpretation of the birth of twins in a dream Most interpreters say that when twins are born in a dream, it depends on the dreamer’s condition. If a woman is pregnant, the twins may experience severe pain later in the pregnancy or difficulty in giving birth. This pain is said after childbirth because she saw that she had finished giving birth. In the case of a married woman who is not pregnant, her interpretation is sadness and pain over something that is difficult for her, which may be related to her life. With her husband or one of her children, or hardships and hardships and. Poverty, and for a virgin girl, if she sees that she has given birth to twins, this indicates two things, either a sin she committed with a strange man that she must leave her path so that it does not end. Or she will lose some of her dignity and happiness for something in life without getting anything from what she works for. Interpretation of giving birth to twin girls in a dream: female twins or girls is good, optimism, and livelihood, according to the interpreters. A pregnant woman’s vision that she has given birth to twin girls can indicate her safety and the safety of what is in her stomach. After giving birth, it can also indicate the goodness that she will feel in her pregnancy and that she will be happy with it, for something that she prayed to God or wanted, and some commentators said that it is abundance in life and money. As for the young unmarried girl who sees that she has given birth to twins, she will be happy Many times in the coming days, there will be a sudden matter that you did not know and did not expect. As for men, if someone sees that his wife gave birth to twins, then he will gain in trade or a livelihood in his work, money, and excellence in his affairs, and if he sees that he is the one who gives birth to twins, then the people around him will love him, because Daughters are more merciful and attached to the father, so he has prestige and goodness in the souls of those around him. Interpretation of giving birth to more than one twin in a dream: Whoever dreams of a man and his wife in a dream, or a woman and a girl dreaming

title: Interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dream?

Therefore, a different website will show you the following about seeing eggs in a dream: Sheikh Nabulsi said about eggs in a dream that the yolk of the egg means gold, and the white of the egg means the silver of gold. This was referred to in the dream of children and marriage. Eggs also show halal and haram money. It also indicates graves and cemeteries. This means all of this according to the details of the vision and the condition of the dreamer. It also has connotations of collecting money, and eggs can indicate the gathering of relatives. As the dream interpreter says, in the general sense of what eggs are seen in a dream, it is interpreted with children or money. It is also interpreted as seeds, ideas, and projects that have been started. It explains the gathering of the family for its purpose. Interpretation of the types of eggs and their conditions. Large eggs in a dream, meaning the fetus before its birth. Small eggs in a dream indicate a fetus in the first months of pregnancy. Seeing colored eggs in a dream indicates that God is Most High. It is known better about children of different nationalities. As for the meaning of the interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dream, chicken eggs, it is a simple diet. If a person dreams that he is laying an egg under a chicken, this may be a pregnancy for his wife. And whoever sees that a rooster is laying eggs in a dream He gathers people and children under his wing. Anyone who sees pigeon eggs in a dream indicates the beginning of a new project and will be successful. Whoever sees ostrich eggs, cowardly children appear. Whoever sees snake eggs in a dream, this indicates the beginning of a new life. Seeing scorpion eggs in a dream also indicates cunning children. Insect eggs in a dream indicate an intruder. Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing many eggs in a dream indicates a lot of nourishment. This is what we will learn along the way. Interpretation of seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream. This vision clearly shows the meanings that this dreamer will have an important status in the future, and his status will also clearly rise among everyone who knows him. And if he This dreamer lives in another country for another ruler, so this indicates that he will travel to the king’s country and enjoy a huge and great living so that his life will be better than before. Seeing any king in a dreamer’s dream means getting rid of the accumulated fears that make him constantly sad, in addition to expressing a solution to any Problem no matter what. His life. The vision is good news for the dreamer that he will pay off all his debts and become very rich. If this king gives money in a dream to this dreamer and he is in a happy state, then this is a sign that happy things will happen that will bring goodness to him later. But if the king gives If the dreamer sees that the king has come to his house to see and talk to him, this clearly indicates the abundance of goodness in that house. If the dreamer mistreats the king In a dream and insulted him, this is evidence that this king will be insulted by many of his people and that the people will remove all their oppression before this king. It is also a sure expression that this dreamer will reach an important power in the state that will change his life for the happier. Seeing Arab kings bodes well for the dreamer, unlike foreign kings, where it is a sign However, some people wronged him. And if he saw himself as the king of a non-Arab country, this explains his travel and separation from his family to work or study. His visit to the dreamer’s house is considered important evidence of his life, which has greatly improved to the maximum extent. But if the king came to the dreamer’s house, but he was not in good condition. Good and unorganized, this indicates that he entered into a financial struggle that made him feel poor during that period. The king sitting with the dreamer in his house is evidence of his progress in the field in which he works. Eating with him in a dream is important evidence that this fortuneteller has many among the people and that he He continues to be promoted due to his extreme intelligence. The king’s clothing and color in the dream also carry important meanings, as we find that the color red is evidence of his unfitness to be king, as he is very separated from his people. The damage to his country. Interpretation of the dream of seeing King Salman in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees him dead in his dream, this is good and indicates that this dreamer will enjoy a large diet and an infusion of money.
